essentials:
• Hypoallergenic Formulas
  • Non-Comedogenic
  • Look for sunscreens labeled as "broad-spectrum"
  • Mineral Sunscreens (Physical Sunscreens): These sunscreens use active mineral ingredients like zinc oxide and titanium dioxide
  • Additional Ingredients for Soothing and Calming such as aloe vera, green tea extract, or niacinamide (vitamin B3). These ingredients can help reduce redness and inflammation in sensitive skin.

essentials:
• Sunscreens labeled as "oil-free" are formulated without added oils
  • Choose Non-Comedogenic Sunscreens
  • Consider Gel or Gel-Cream Formulas
  • Opt for Matte or Mattifying Sunscreens
  • SPF 30 or Higher
  • Mineral sunscreens containing zinc or titanium dioxide are less likely to clogpores
